<EFX_ACCOUNTING_CHANGES>
<A NAME="FIS_ACCOUNTING_CHANGES"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITEM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CHANGES IN AND DISAGREEMENTS WITH ACCOUNTANTS ON ACCOUNT AND FINANCIAL DISCLOSURES
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	None.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_ACCOUNTING_CHANGES>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<A NAME="A2016123110KDOCUMENT_HTM_SE89AB7FA9F58AADD354EDA950BD836F9">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>
<A NAME="FIS_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITEM 9A. CONTROLS AND PROCEDURES
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Evaluation of disclosure controls and procedures
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We maintain &#8220;disclosure controls and procedures,&#8221; as such term is defined in Rule 13a-15(e) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;), that are designed to ensure that information required to be disclosed by us in reports that we file or submit under the Exchange Act is recorded, processed, summarized, and reported within the time periods specified in Securities and Exchange Commission rules and forms and that such information is accumulated and communicated to our management, including our Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, as appropriate, to allow timely decisions regarding required disclosure. In designing and evaluating our disclosure controls and procedures, management recognized that disclosure controls and procedures, no matter how well conceived and operated, can provide only reasonable, not absolute, assurance that the objectives of the disclosure controls and procedures are met. Our disclosure controls and procedures have been designed to meet reasonable assurance standards. Additionally, in designing disclosure controls and procedures, our management necessarily was required to apply its judgment in evaluating the cost-benefit relationship of possible disclosure controls and procedures. Any design of disclosure controls and procedures also is based in part upon certain assumptions about the likelihood of future events, and there can be no assurance that any design will succeed in achieving its stated goals under all potential future conditions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on their evaluation as of the end of the period covered by this Report on Form 10-K, our Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer have concluded that our disclosure controls and procedures were effective as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Management&#8217;s report on internal controls over financial reporting
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The management of Energy Focus, Inc. is responsible for establishing and maintaining adequate internal control over financial reporting, as such term is defined in Exchange Act Rule 13a-15(f). Under the supervision and with the participation of management, including our Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, we conducted an evaluation of the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting based upon criteria established in &#8220;Internal Control &#8211; Integrated Framework (2013)&#8221; issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (the &#8220;COSO Framework&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	An effective internal control system, no matter how well designed, has inherent limitations, including the possibility of human error and circumvention or overriding of controls; therefore, it can provide only reasonable assurance with respect to reliable financial reporting. Furthermore, effectiveness of an internal control system in future periods cannot be guaranteed, because the design of any system of internal controls is based in part upon assumptions about the likelihood of future events. There can be no assurance that any control design will succeed in achieving its stated goals under all potential future conditions. Over time, certain controls may become inadequate because of changes in business conditions, or the degree of compliance with policies and procedures may deteriorate. As such, misstatements due to error or fraud may occur and not be detected.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based upon our evaluation under the COSO framework as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, management concluded that its internal control over financial reporting was effective as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Changes in internal control over financial reporting
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the fourth quarter of 2016, there were no material changes in our internal controls over financial reporting (as defined in Rule 13a-15(f) under the Exchange Act) that have materially affected, or are reasonably likely to materially affect, our internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_AUDITORS_OPINION>
<A NAME="FIS_AUDITORS_OPINION_2"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Attestation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Report of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Independent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Registered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Public
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Accounting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Firm
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:10PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This Annual Report does not include an attestation report of our independent registered public accounting firm regarding internal control over financial reporting. Management&#8217;s report was not subject to attestation by our independent public accounting firm pursuant to the rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission that permit us to provide only management&#8217;s report.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	67
</FONT>
</DIV>

Our Code of Ethics and Business Conduct can be found on our website at www.energyfocus.com. Any person may receive a copy free of charge by writing to us at Energy Focus, Inc., 32000 Aurora Road, Suite B, Solon, Ohio 44139, Attention: Secretary.

<DIV CLASS="eolNewPage"></DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage74"></A>
<A NAME="EXHIBIT1013TTEWKSBURYOFF_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:1EM;WIDTH:799;">
<!-- SLIDE 0001 -->
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-TOP:2EM;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2017/02/23/0000924168-17-000008_EXHIBIT1013TTEWKSBURYOFF001.JPG" TITLE="PAGE 1" WIDTH="799" HEIGHT="1034">
<DIV>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1PT;COLOR:WHITE">
	32000 Aurora Road Solon, OH 44139 tel 440.715.1300 800.327.7877 fax 440.715.1301&#13;&#10; November 17, 2016&#13;&#10; Theodore L. Tewksbury III&#13;&#10; 5728 La Seyne Place&#13;&#10; San Jose, CA 95138&#13;&#10; Re: Executive Chairman Position&#13;&#10; Dear Ted:&#13;&#10; Subject to the formal approval of the Board of Directors of Energy Focus, Inc., it is with great enthusiasm that I&#13;&#10; extend to you this invitation to join the Board of Directors and offer of employment for the position of Executive&#13;&#10; Chairman of Energy Focus, Inc., with a start date of December 12, 2016.&#13;&#10; Our offer for employment includes:&#13;&#10; 1. Base salary - Your starting annualized salary will be $200,000, paid on a monthly basis, which&#13;&#10; computes to $16,666.67.&#13;&#10; 2. Equity Award - You will receive a grant of RSUs having a total grant date value of approximately&#13;&#10; $100,000 (with the number of units calculated by dividing $100,000 by the 30-day average closing price&#13;&#10; of the Company&#39;s stock for the period ending on the last trading day prior to the grant date), which units&#13;&#10; shall vest on the first anniversary of the grant date.&#13;&#10; 3. Expenses - Energy Focus will reimburse you for all Company approved business travel and&#13;&#10; entertainment expenses within the guidelines of the Company&#39;s Travel and Entertainment Expense&#13;&#10; Policy, including reasonable temporary housing, in the form of a hotel or apartment, for the time spent at&#13;&#10; the company&#39;s Solon, Ohio headquarters. All Travel and Entertainment expenses must be submitted&#13;&#10; via expense reports including receipts.&#13;&#10; 4. New Hire Documentation- As part of the hiring process, you will be required to complete certain&#13;&#10; Federal, State and company documentation. In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be&#13;&#10; required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required&#13;&#10; employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.&#13;&#10; 5. Company Handbook/Confidentiality Agreement - Due to the large amount of intellectual property&#13;&#10; and other Company propriety factors, as well as company rules and standards, we require you to sign&#13;&#10; several agreements upon joining the Company that confirm your commitment to confidentiality, code of&#13;&#10; conduct and ethical behavior.&#13;&#10; 6. At Will Employment - The employment relationship between you and the Company shall be &quot;at will&quot;,&#13;&#10; terminable by either party at any time for any or no reason.&#13;&#10;&#13;&#10;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<P>

	&nbsp;

Tewksbury III and Bradley B. White, or any one or more of them, his or her true &#13;&#10;and lawful attorney, for him or her and in his or her name, place and stead, to execute, by manual &#13;&#10;or facsimile signature, electronic transmission or otherwise, the Annual Report on Form 10-K of &#13;&#10;the Company for the year ended December 31, 2016, and any amendments or supplements to &#13;&#10;said Annual Report and to cause the same to be filed with the Securities and Exchange &#13;&#10;Commission, together with any exhibits, financial statements and schedules included or to be &#13;&#10;incorporated by reference therein, hereby granting to said attorneys full power and authority to &#13;&#10;do and perform each and every act and thing whatsoever requisite or desirable to be done in and &#13;&#10;about the premises as fully to all intents and purposes as the undersigned might or could do in &#13;&#10;person, hereby ratifying and confirming all acts and things which said attorneys may do or cause &#13;&#10;to be done by virtue of these presents. &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned has hereunto set his or her hand and seal as of &#13;&#10;the 16 day of February, 2017. &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10; /s/ Ronald D. <A NAME="eolPage91"></A>
<A NAME="EXHIBIT311_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:1EM;WIDTH:799;">
<!-- SLIDE 0001 -->
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-TOP:2EM;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2017/02/23/0000924168-17-000008_EXHIBIT311001.JPG" TITLE="PAGE 1" WIDTH="799" HEIGHT="1034">
<DIV>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1PT;COLOR:WHITE">
	EXHIBIT 31.1 &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;CERTIFICATION &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;I, Theodore L. Tewksbury III, certify that: &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;1. I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form 10-K of Energy Focus, Inc.; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact &#13;&#10;necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading &#13;&#10;with respect to the period covered by this report; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all &#13;&#10;material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods &#13;&#10;presented in this report; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;4. The registrant&#39;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures &#13;&#10;(as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in &#13;&#10;Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and we have; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(a) Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed &#13;&#10;under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated &#13;&#10;subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is &#13;&#10;being prepared; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(b) Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be &#13;&#10;designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the &#13;&#10;preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(c) Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#39;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our &#13;&#10;conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this &#13;&#10;report based on such evaluation; and &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(d) Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the &#13;&#10;registrant&#39;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has &#13;&#10;materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; &#13;&#10;and &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;5. The registrant&#39;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over &#13;&#10;financial reporting, to the registrant&#39;s auditors and the audit committee of registrant&#39;s board of directors (or persons performing &#13;&#10;the equivalent functions): &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(a) All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial &#13;&#10;reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#39;s ability to record, process, summarize and report &#13;&#10;financial information; and &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the &#13;&#10;registrant&#39;s internal control over financial reporting. &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10; /s/ Theodore L. Tewksbury III &#13;&#10; Theodore L. Tewksbury III &#13;&#10; Chairman, Chief Executive Officer and President &#13;&#10; Date: February 23, 2017 &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;&#13;&#10;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage92"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage93"></A>
<A NAME="EXHIBIT312_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31_2"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:1EM;WIDTH:799;">
<!-- SLIDE 0001 -->
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-TOP:2EM;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2017/02/23/0000924168-17-000008_EXHIBIT312001.JPG" TITLE="PAGE 1" WIDTH="799" HEIGHT="1034">
<DIV>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1PT;COLOR:WHITE">
	EXHIBIT 31.2 &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;CERTIFICATION &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;I, Bradley B. White, certify that: &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;1. I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form 10-K of Energy Focus, Inc.; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact &#13;&#10;necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading &#13;&#10;with respect to the period covered by this report; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all &#13;&#10;material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods &#13;&#10;presented in this report; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;4. The registrant&#39;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures &#13;&#10;(as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in &#13;&#10;Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and we have; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(a) Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed &#13;&#10;under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated &#13;&#10;subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is &#13;&#10;being prepared; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(b) Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be &#13;&#10;designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the &#13;&#10;preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(c) Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#39;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our &#13;&#10;conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this &#13;&#10;report based on such evaluation; and &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(d) Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the &#13;&#10;registrant&#39;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has &#13;&#10;materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; &#13;&#10;and &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;5. The registrant&#39;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over &#13;&#10;financial reporting, to the registrant&#39;s auditors and the audit committee of registrant&#39;s board of directors (or persons performing &#13;&#10;the equivalent functions): &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(a) All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial &#13;&#10;reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#39;s ability to record, process, summarize and report &#13;&#10;financial information; and &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the &#13;&#10;registrant&#39;s internal control over financial reporting. &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10; /s/ Bradley B. White &#13;&#10; Bradley B. White &#13;&#10; Chief Financial Officer &#13;&#10; Date: February 23, 2017 &#13;&#10;&#13;&#10;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<P>

SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED &#13;&#10;PURSUANT TO SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002 &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;In connection with the Annual Report of Energy Focus, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016 &#13;&#10;(the &#8220;Report&#8221;), I, Theodore L. Tewksbury III, Chairman, Chief Executive Officer and President of the Company and I, Bradley B. &#13;&#10;White, Chief Financial Officer of the Company, each certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 &#13;&#10;of the Sarbanes Oxley Act of 2002, that to the best of my knowledge: &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(i) the Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;(ii) the information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations &#13;&#10; of the Company. &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10; /s/ Theodore L. Tewksbury III &#13;&#10; Theodore L. Tewksbury III &#13;&#10;Chairman, Chief Executive Officer and President &#13;&#10; Date: February 23, 2017 &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10; /s/ Bradley B. White &#13;&#10; Bradley B. White &#13;&#10;Chief Financial Officer &#13;&#10; Date: February 23, 2017 &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;A signed original of this written statement required by Section 906 has been provided to Energy Focus, Inc. and will be retained by &#13;&#10;Energy Focus, Inc. and furnished to the Securities and Exchange Commission or its staff upon request. &#13;&#10; &#13;&#10;&#13;&#10;
